message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand that $70 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $82. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $75?

Hi Bob, I understand that $75 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $79. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $78?

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $80. I can offer it to you for $79.99. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll sell it to you. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
